choices: Poke your face in the hole.
Climb the stairs and step through the door.
1.content:
You've successfully snuck around to the back of the carnival area without being spotted by anyone in the huge line at the front or any of the carnival workers in the nearby trailers. You've yet to find a way in to where the public are, but you can hear them on the other side of the wall in front of you.

There happens to be an oval shaped hole in the wall, big enough to poke your face through, where you could could see what's happening on the public side.

To your right, a wooden stairwell leads to a small door. If you went through there, you might be able to see everything from above the crowd's eye level.

To your left, there's a small door that is probably the back entrance to the fun house.

What do you want to do?
1.title: The Backside of the Carnival

11.content:
As you stick your face into the hole, you lean your weight against the wall. In so doing, you accidentally dislodge the heavy tarp above the wall, which rolls down over
your back to thump on the ground by your feet. You attempt you push yourself back from the wall, but the weight of the tarp has you pinned in place. You can't even
move your arms, which (like the rest of you) are held tight against the wall by the heavy, immovable canvas. Your struggling draws the attention of a carny on the
crowd's side of the wall, to which your face is exposed.

"Pie toss! We got a fresh target here, folks. Who wants to throw a pie?"

A small crowd gathers in front of the carny as he hands out heavily laden cream pies.

Who gets to throw one at you first?

*Pick up a pie in your left hand, and hold it in front of your chin.*
11.title: Poke your face in the hole.

111.content: The Jock hefts his pie in his right hand and smirks at you smugly. He gives you just enough time to start sweating before he rears back and hurls the pie at you with all his considerable strength.
111.title: The Muscle-bound Jock

1111.content:
The pie slams into the wall a full yard away from your face. It looks like all his muscles didn't give him any accuracy. You grin at your luck as the jock sneers and walks away.

Behind the wall the outstretched fingers of your right hand brush the edge of wood. If you could just inch your body a little more to the right, you could grab the edge and pull yourself free. You start to slide your body to the right as the next thrower steps up.

Who's going to throw this time?

*Keep that pie right where it is.*
1111.title: Hit or Miss?

11111.content: The pitcher steps up to the line and squares off to an imaginary third base. He looks at your face just as he does the catcher's mitt on a game day. He pulls back and fires the pie right at you.
11111.title: The Baseball Pitcher

111111.content:
In mid throw, the Cheerleader playfully blows on the Pitcher's ear, and his throw goes wild. The pie splatters a couple feet to the right of your face, a piece of it bouncing off your cheek before falling to the ground.

*Dab some pie on your cheek, then hold it back in front of your chin.*

The Pitcher walks away, distractedly glancing at the Cheerleader as he goes.

The tips of your fingers are now over the edge of the wall. You can tug your body to the right a bit easier now, but you're still not quite free.

Who throws the last pie?
111111.title: Hit or Miss?

1111111.content: The Cheerleader giggles with excitement and beckons all her friends to come watch her humiliate you, she bounces in anticipation and tries to keep the heavy pie from dripping its cream down on her sneakers. With her friends gathered around to cheer her on, she grins at you wickedly and tosses the pie in a slow arch directly in line with your face.
1111111.title: The Cheerleader

choices: Climb the stairs and step through the door.
11111111.content:
*SPLAT!*

The Cheerleader points at you and laughs with her free hand over her mouth. All of her friends are laughing at you too. You sputter to breathe as your cheeks burn with humiliation. The cheerleader and her friends mock you with fake sympathy, then turn and walk away.

You've finally got a good grasp of the edge of the wall. You pull yourself out from underneath the tarp.

Now that you're free of that mess, you still have the option the door above the stairs, or the fun house.
11111111.title: Hit or Miss?

1111112.content: The Little Girl holds her heavy pie with both hands and laughs at your silly position. The carny invites her to take a few steps closer to you, so she gets a sporting chance to hit you. With both hands, she lifts the pie as high she can above her head, and as she pulls her arms back to throw, the pie slips from her fingers and splatters on the ground behind her. She turns around and frowns at the mess, then turns her puppydog eyes on to the carny. The carny sighs, nods, and hands her another pie.
1111112.title: The Little Girl

choices: Climb the stairs and step through the door.
11111121.content:
She smiles broadly, and as soon as she gets a hold of the pie, runs straight up to you and smears it all over your face.

*SPLAT!*

The Little Girl giggles at you and runs off.

You've finally got a good grasp of the edge of the wall. You pull yourself out from underneath the tarp.

Now that you're free of that mess, you still have the option the door above the stairs, or the fun house.
11111121.title: Hit or Miss?

113111112.content:
You open the back door to the fun house and slip inside. The lights are dim and the room appears to be dominated by dusty scaffolding and the clutter of buckets, ropes, pulleys, and a stack of mirror panes. Above you, you can hear foot steps. Suddenly, you hear a surprised shriek followed by a stream of giggles. You deduce that the fun side of the fun house is above you, but how to get up there?

Looking up, you notice a square hole in the corner of the ceiling, and three ropes dangling down from it. It appears as if you could climb up to the next floor on any of these ropes. You test your weight on each of them, and they all seem up to the task. A light shines down from above, obscuring your view of whatever the ropes are attached to, but they are so twisted around each other that you aren't sure you could trace any of them top to bottom anyway.

It seems that your only option is to pick a rope and climb it.

*Pick up a slime and hold it above your head.*
113111112.title: Sneak into the fun house.

choices: Whos's going to throw a pie at you?
1131111121.content:
You've climbed about halfway up the rope when you hear a clank from above a feel a sudden shift of the rope. You tighten you grip instinctively as the rope slides quickly toward the adjacent wall. Bracing yourself for impact, you clench your eyes, but all you feel is a bit of fabric parting around you as the sliding rope you cling to accelerates. You glance back at the wall you passed through, now understanding that that section was only a painted tent flap. Heaving a sigh of relief, you turn back to the direction you are sliding in just in time to see wall before you hit it. The thin wooden wall shudders and absorbs most of the impact, but you are still dazed as you drop from the rope to your feet and fall forward, pitching your face into the hole in front of it.

A heavy tarp above the wall rolls down over your back to thump on the ground by your feet. You attempt you push yourself back from the wall, but the weight of the tarp has you pinned in place. You can't even move your arms, which (like the rest of you) are held tight against the wall by the heavy, immovable canvas. Your struggling draws the attention of a carny on the crowd's side of the wall, to which your face is exposed.

"Pie toss! We got a fresh target here, folks. Who wants throw a pie?"

A small crowd gathers in front of the carny as he hands out heavily laden cream pies.

*Put down the slime, then pick up a pie in your left hand and hold it in front of your chin.*
1131111121.title: Climb the first rope.

12.content:
You climb the steps and try to open the door. Unfortunately, it only moves in about an inch before it stops short. There's a little bit of give yet, so whatever is block the door could probably be moved if you pushed hard enough. Both hands aren't enough, but when you lean your whole body into the door and really push with your legs, you start to make progress. You've pushed the door in another few inches when suddenly all its resistance stops and the door flies inward. You pitch forward, expecting your face to slam into the floor, but instead it keeps heading down through where you expected the floor to be. Your knees fall onto something solid, and before you can tumble down into the depths, you reach up to grab the plank you are kneeling on. You look down to see that your face is just a few inches away from a large tank of water. Lifting you head back above your knees, you hear the door click shut behind you. A glance over your shoulders proves what you fear to be true; there is no knob or handle on this side of the door. You are trapped on this narrow plank that is perched above the water.

A carnival woman calls out to a milling crowd of passerby, "Step right up, folks. We got a new sap to sink in the dunk tank!"

She begins handing balls out to some of the people. One them immediately throws theirs at the target, but misses by a good distance. You breathe a quick sigh of relief when you realize you aren't falling yet, but if you don't escape soon, you're going to get drenched.

*Pick up a water in your left hand and hold it above your head.*

Try to escape.

12111.content:
CLANK!

Another ball barely misses the target as you try to pry open the door that would let you off of this plank. Try as you might, you can't seem to get a grip on the edge of the door. What can you do? There's no choice but to keep trying, and hope that you succeed before someone hits the target and sends you down into the water below.

"Try to escape."
12111.title: Try to escape.

12112.content:
DING!

*SPLASH!*

A split second of sudden weightlessness precedes as splashdown into the cold water. You gasp with the shock of it, then hold your breath as you go under. Moments later, your head clears the water and you sputter and gasp some more. The crowd cheers and laughs at your misfortune. After a couple seconds of treading water, you hear the plank behind you right itself and click into place. You grab onto it and haul yourself back on top of it.

The carnival lady just keeps on handing out balls, and less that a minute has passed before another one clanks into the backboard near the target. It looks like nobody is just going to let you out. You have to find someway to open that door.

*Pick up another water and hold it above your head*

"Try to escape."
12112.title: Try to escape.

12113.content:
CLANK!

Another near miss makes you jump in place. You just cant seem to get a grip on the door. 'This sucks,' you think to yourself, and then it hits you: Suction! You lick the palm of you hand then place it flat against the door. As you pull it away, the door is pulled with it for a fraction of an inch. That's all you need to get a grip on it with your other hand, and then you are wrenching the door open and rolling out to your freedom. You let the door close behind you as you breath a sigh of relief.

*Congratulations! You've escaped relatively unharmed. You may now pat yourself on the back, and be happy with your luck, or... you could always start the game over again.*

1213121.title: Hit or Miss?

1213122.content:
Your toss falls shorts and splatters well below the target's face. He laughs at your failure. Angered, you call for another pie.

*SPLAT!*

You get another pie, right in the kisser. A clown was walking by when you made your request and clearly couldn't resist a straight line like that. You clear your eyes amid the chuckles of the crowd behind you.

The carny hands you another pie. You take aim once more, and throw.

*Pick up another pie.*

"Hit or Miss?"
1213122.title: Hit or Miss?

choices: Throw balls at the dunk tank.
12132.content:
1 throw at dunk tank
2 hit or miss
12132.title: dunk tank12

12133.content:
You step up to the stage to get a good view of the show. At the moment, a clown is balancing on a giant rubber ball. The clown is explaining how the next act will require a volunteer from the audience. Before you can avert your eyes and look nonchalant, You feel your arm being lifted in the air and a voice behind you shouts, "We got a volunteer right here!"
Despite your protestations, you are hauled up on stage by the combined efforts on the clown that just stepped off of the giant ball and the clown that had snuck up behind you and claimed you as a volunteer. They place you at the center of the stage and start a two person juggling act. The pair of clowns are flanking you on the stage, juggling balls pass between them and whiz by your head. As you watch, the clowns begin to grab and toss other objects into the juggling mix. You see a rubber chicken, water balloons and even a cream pie fly over your head as you get to your feet. This may be a good time to make an exit.

*Pick up a pie in one hand, and a water in the other.*

"Step out of the juggling circle."
12133.title: Go watch the clown on the stage.

13.content:
You open the back door to the fun house and slip inside. The lights are dim and the room appears to be dominated by dusty scaffolding and the clutter of buckets, ropes, pulleys, and a stack of mirror panes. Above you, you can hear foot steps. Suddenly, you hear a surprised shriek followed by a stream of giggles. You deduce that the fun side of the fun house is above you, but how to get up there?

Looking up, you notice a square hole in the corner of the ceiling, and three ropes dangling down from it. It appears as if you could climb up to the next floor on any of these ropes. You test your weight on each of them, and they all seem up to the task. A light shines down from above, obscuring your view of whatever the ropes are attached to, but they are so twisted around each other that you aren't sure you could trace any of them top to bottom anyway.

It seems that your only option is to pick a rope and climb it.

*Pick up a slime and hold it above your head.*

"Climb the first rope." 

"Climb the second rope." 

"Climb the third rope."
13.title: Sneak into the fun house.

131.content: You have strayed outside the confines of the game. Please click "go back" above, and then hit one of the links embedded in the story.
131.title: *Click one of the Links Above*

1311.content: here are fun house options for the ropes.
1311.title: a

13111.content:
1 is success.
2 is slimed success and pie booth
13111.title: Climb the first rope123.

131111.content:
You make it to the hole in the ceiling without incident and pull yourself up onto the next floor. The first thing you see is yourself. You find yourself in a room surrounded by mirrors. Closer inspection shows you an opening to a short hallway of mirrors. After a few feet, it turns sharply to the right and slopes upward. A few yards over and a few feet up lead you to a dead end, but before you head back the way you came, you notice a pair of hand prints on the mirror to your left. Placing your own hands over the prints, you shove the mirror which gives way to a small room. The mirror swings closed behind you and you immediately feel disoriented.

You find yourself on a small square of floor space with four mirrored walls. Each of the mirrors has two hand prints at the center of them. You are pretty sure which is the mirror you just came from, but that leaves three mirrors untested. Perhaps one of them will lead you out of the mirror maze.

Which one should you push?

*Keep that slime above your head.*

"Push the first mirror." 

"Push the second mirror." 

"Push the third mirror."
131111.title: Climb the first rope.

131112.content:
1 slimed success
2 pie booth
131112.title: slimed success and pie booth

1311121.content:
You've climbed about halfway up the rope when you feel something cold and slimy fall onto your head and run down your neck.

*SPLAT!*

There's no way to dodge the stream without falling, so you just hold on to the rope as the slime covers you. When it finally stops, you resume climbing.

You make it to the hole in the ceiling without incident and pull yourself up onto the next floor. The first thing you see is yourself. You find yourself in a room surrounded by mirrors. Closer inspection shows you an opening to a short hallway of mirrors. After a few feet, it turns sharply to the right and slopes upward. A few yards over and a few feet up lead you to a dead end, but before you head back the way you came, you notice a pair of hand prints on the mirror to your left. Placing your own hands over the prints, you shove the mirror which gives way to a small room. The mirror swings closed behind you and you immediately feel disoriented.

You find yourself on a small square of floor space with four mirrored walls. Each of the mirrors has two hand prints at the center of them. You are pretty sure which is the mirror you just came from, but that leaves three mirrors untested. Perhaps one of them will lead you out of the mirror maze.

*Pick up another slime and hold it above your head.*

Which one should you push?

"Push the first mirror." 

"Push the second mirror." 

"Push the third mirror."
1311121.title: Climb the first rope.

1311122.content:
You've climbed about halfway up the rope when you hear a clank from above a feel a sudden shift of the rope. You tighten you grip instinctively as the rope slides quickly toward the adjacent wall. Bracing yourself for impact, you clench your eyes, but all you feel is a bit of fabric parting around you as the sliding rope you cling to accelerates. You glance back at the wall you passed through, now understanding that that section was only a painted tent flap. Heaving a sigh of relief, you turn back to the direction you are sliding in just in time to see wall before you hit it. The thin wooden wall shudders and absorbs most of the impact, but you are still dazed as you drop from the rope to your feet and fall forward, pitching your face into the hole in front of it.

A heavy tarp above the wall rolls down over your back to thump on the ground by your feet. You attempt you push yourself back from the wall, but the weight of the tarp has you pinned in place. You can't even move your arms, which (like the rest of you) are held tight against the wall by the heavy, immovable canvas. Your struggling draws the attention of a carny on the crowd's side of the wall, to which your face is exposed.

"Pie toss! We got a fresh target here, folks. Who wants throw a pie?"

A small crowd gathers in front of the carny as he hands out heavily laden cream pies.

*Put down the slime, then pick up a pie in your left hand and hold it in front of your chin.*

"Who's going to throw a pie at you?"
1311122.title: Climb the first rope.

13112.content:
1 is success.
2 is slimed success and pie booth

1312.content: here are fun house options for the mirrors.
1312.title: b

13121.content:
1 is success.
2 is slimed success and dunk tank.
13121.title: Push the first mirror123

131211.content:
*Put down the slime.*

The mirror gives way to open to a circular room with three large holes in the walls. As you enter the room, the mirror behind you swings shut, and the floor starts to spin slowly. The holes are your only way out, and with the floor spinning, you can't even tell which direction you came from, let alone where the holes lead. All you can tell about the holes is that they are each the beginning of a slide.

As the room continues to spin, you are starting to get very dizzy.

You had better just pick a hole and dive in.

"Jump into the first hole." 

"Jump into the second hole." 

"Jump into the third hole."
131211.title: Push the first mirror.

131212.content:
1 slimed success
2 pie booth
131212.title: slimed success and dunk tank.

1312121.content:
*SPLAT!*

As you push your way past the mirror, a bucket dislodges from above it and pours down over your head.

The mirror gives way to open to a circular room with three large holes in the walls. As you enter the room, the mirror behind you swings shut, and the floor starts to spin slowly. The holes are your only way out, and with the floor spinning, you can't even tell which direction you came from, let alone where the holes lead. "Jump into the first hole." 

"Jump into the second hole." 

"Jump into the third hole."
1312121.title: Push the first mirror.

1312122.content:
The mirror gives way, but as it does, the floor tilts forward, pitching you forward. You fall, expecting your face to slam into the floor, but instead it keeps heading down through where you expected the floor to be. Your knees fall onto something solid, and before you can tumble down into the depths, you reach up to grab the plank you are kneeling on. You look down to see that your face is just a few inches away from a large tank of water. Lifting you head back above your knees, you hear the wall click shut behind you. A glance over your shoulders proves what you fear to be true; there is no knob or handle on this side of the wall. You are trapped on this narrow plank that is perched above the water.

A carnival woman calls out to a milling crowd of passerby, "Step right up, folks. We got a new sap to sink in the dunk tank!"

She begins handing balls out to some of the people. One them immediately throws theirs at the target, but misses by a good distance. You breathe a quick sigh of relief when you realize you aren't falling yet, but if you don't escape soon, you're going to get drenched.

*Put down the slime, then pick up a water in your left hand and hold it above your head.*

"Try to escape."

13131.title: Jump into the first hole123

131311.content:
You dive into the hole and ride the slide down, spinning as you go. At the base of the slide, a curved ramp sends you flying through the air to land on your feet in the middle of the park. Patrons glance at you, some of them briefly clap at your apparent stunt, then they move on.

Congratulations! You have successfully snuck into the park, and are free to enjoy all of its games and rides. In the immediate area, you can see a dunk tank, a pie toss game, and up on a stage, a clown is in the middle of a juggling act.

Which attraction would you like to visit?

Throw balls at the dunk tank.

"Throw pies at the pie toss." 

"Go watch the clown on the stage."
131311.title: Jump into the first hole.

131312.content:
1 slime tube
2 clown show
131312.title: slimed and clown show.

1313121.content:
You dive into the hole and ride the slide down, spinning as you go. The slide drops you off inside a man-sized transparent upright tube with no apparent exit. On the other side of the tube, you can see guests of the carnival passing on their way to other attractions. You pound on the tube walls to get their attention, hoping they'll help you escape. A child walks up to a low display placed in front of the tube. On the display, you can see an array of buttons.

*Pick up a slime and hold it above your head.*

"The kid presses a button."

A child walks up to a low display placed in front of the tube. On the display, you can see an array of buttons.

*Pick up a slime and hold it above your head.*

"The kid presses a button."
1313321.title: Jump into the third hole.

1313322.content:
You dive into the hole and ride the slide down, spinning as you go. At the base of the slide, a curved ramp sends you flying through the air to land heavily on your backside in the middle of a stage. A pair of clowns are flanking you on the stage, juggling balls pass between them and whiz by your head. As you watch, the clowns begin to grab and toss other objects into the juggling mix. You see a rubber chicken, water balloons and even a cream pie fly over your head as you get to your feet. This may be a good time to make an exit.

*Pick up a pie in one hand, and a water in the other.*

"Step out of the juggling circle."
1313322.title: Jump into the third hole.

info.brief_description: This is a game meant for those who enjoy wam and/or slapstick comedy when they are alone.
info.description:
This story is actually a game meant for those who enjoy wam and/or slapstick comedy when they are alone.

To play, you must prepare at least 1 cream pie, 1 glass of water, and 1 cup of slime (treacle for those across the pond). Three of each would be better, but depending on your choices, you may not need them all. The idea of this game is to avoid messy conclusions if possible. However, if you encounter the word *SPLAT!* or *SPLASH* at any time during the story, you must IMMEDIATELY empty the contents of your left hand into your own face.
You'll probably want to lay a tarp down underneath and behind your chair (I'm not paying any cleaning bills).


You have come to attend a carnival, but rather than pay any entrance fees, you have decided to sneak in. Will your sneakiness earn you a just reward?
